definition: very thin especially from disease or hunger or cold
details:
adjective
- very thin especially from disease or hunger or cold
= synonyms: bony
- sounding as if the nose were pinched
= synonyms: adenoidal, nasal
- as if squeezed uncomfortably tight
= example: as if squeezed uncomfortably tight
- not having enough money to pay for necessities
= synonyms: penurious, hard up, impecunious, in straitened circumstances, penniless
